alert.note: Alert for Henry (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 5:36PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Spalding and southwestern Henry Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 536 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Towalaga, or near Griffin, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Griffin, McDonough, Hampton, Locust Grove, Sunny Side, East Griffin, Highland Mills, Blacksville, Towalaga, Luella, Experiment and Walker Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
